etri.sdn.controller.module.statemanager

Class OFMStateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • etri.sdn.controller.OFModule
      • etri.sdn.controller.module.statemanager.OFMStateManager

  • public class OFMStateManager
extends OFModule
    This module does not handle any OFMessage. The purpose of this module is to handle REST calls that request status-related information including: (1) controller health (2) switch description (3) port information (4) aggregated flow statistics
    Author:
    bjlee
